name: Blinky's Hasty Adventure
description:
Blinky’s Hasty Adventure is a punishing 3D Platforming game.
The isometric camera adds a new perspective to the well-known genre of 3D platforming games.
Built towards speedrunning, players will be presented with short yet tough levels where mastering character movement is the key to success.
Maneuver your way through level with each their unique elements and compete for a place of the leaderboards.
